p: In the study conducted by Duduk et al. [ 2], clove bud, thyme and cinnamon bark essential oils were fungistatic on mycelial growth of C. acutatum (667 μL L −1 of medium) and their volatiles disabled appressoria formation (1.53 μL L −1 of air) and prevented conidia germination (76.5, 15.3 and 1.5 μL L −1 of air respectively).
